## About

This repository contains all the R code and data to reproduce the analyses and
figures in *"If we want to restore biodiveristy, then grasslands may be our best bet"*.

## Folder structure

1. `Data` contains Red List data for Germany and Brazil with Ellenberg indicator values and habitat associations, as well as plant occupancy trend data from [Eichenberg et al 2020](https://doi.org/10.1111/gcb.15447).

2. `Rcode` contains all the code for data carpentry, analysis and visualization.

3. `Figures` contains the pdf versions of the figures in the manuscript.
